mapper.sql: num, field_name, field_addr, field_morning, field_afternoon, field_night, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, lat, lng
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*,ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT num, field_name, field_addr, field_morning, field_afternoon, field_night, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, lat, lng FROM field
OR field_name LIKE '%'||#{field_name}||'%'
OR field_addr LIKE '%'||#{field_addr}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM field
OR field_name LIKE '%'||#{field_name}||'%'
OR field_addr LIKE '%'||#{field_addr}||'%'

SELECT result1.* FROM ( SELECT num, field_name, field_addr, field_morning, field_afternoon, field_night, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, lat, lng , LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum FROM field
OR field_name LIKE '%'||#{field_name}||'%'
OR field_addr LIKE '%'||#{field_addr}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC ) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO field (num, field_name, field_addr, field_morning, field_afternoon, field_night, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, lat, lng) VALUES(field_seq.NEXTVAL, #{field_name}, #{field_addr}, #{field_morning}, #{field_afternoon}, #{field_night},#{orgFileName},#{saveFileName},#{fileSize},#{lat}, #{lng})
